::Feline::

She picked up the grenade and threw it back at Beholder. She got 
struck in the chest by the machine gun.  She growled and fired her 
rifle at Kracken.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Mobster was the gestalt, he broke back up into the Mafia again.
> 
> BIC: Kracken was struck in the chest. He directs his machine gun to 
Feline
> and fires it. say, to prevent overkill from 5 characters, 15 
bullets. Gigas
> was hit and fires 3 shots at Feline. Grenade flies into the air to 
avoid it.
> Beholder is struck and spins around to face Feline, throwing a 
grenade at
> her. Horn Drill dodges by ziping around the shots with some great 
speed...
